docs.snippet: Iceland’s startling, feel-good run at the European Championships continues on Sunday with a quarterfinal game against France....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iceland’s startling, feel-good run at the European Championships continues on Sunday with a quarterfinal game against France.
docs.abstract: Iceland men's national soccer team's improbable run through European Championships, including stunning upset of England, is likely to climax with upcoming quarterfinal match against tournament's host France.

headline.main: How Tiny, Quirky Iceland Won Over Soccer Fans Worldwide
headline.print_headline: Tiny. Quirky. Iceland  Enthralls a Continent.

docs.snippet: A young man whose last Facebook post said "we are safe." A baggage porter just doing his job. A Palestinian woman and her 3-year-old son on a Ramadan vacation, whose death is being grieved by their injured husband and father....
